overview: Frank Cross is a wildly successful television executive whose cold ambition and curmudgeonly nature has driven away the love of his life. But after firing staff member Eliot Loudermilk  on Christmas Eve, Frank is visited by a series of ghosts who give him a chance to re-evaluate his actions and right the wrongs of his past.
tagline: The spirits will move you in odd and hysterical ways.
cast: Bill Murray|Karen Allen|John Forsythe|John Glover|Bobcat Goldthwait
